definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a clean animal, LXX pu/gargov cf. Vulgate; hence AV RV & most

definitions.title: pygarg
definitions.body: , a kind of antelope or gazelle, cf. Di Le 11:2.; perh. rather mountain-goat, Hom:NS 391 cf. Eth.Vrs.; only De 14:5—(Hom:l. c. der. fr. √ [[דושׁ]] with kindred meaning of spring, leap & comp. As. daššu; so already Dl:S i. 54).
